hero.title: Wake up to Positano's skyline from a huge shared terrace
hero.subtitle: Our largest dorm terrace pairs six beds with private indoor comforts.
bullets: Panoramic terrace with lounge seating and breakfast tables
Private bathroom stocked with fresh towels
Fast Wi-Fi, air-conditioning and key-card lockers for each guest

outline.heading: What to expect in the terrace dorm

items.title: Outdoor space big enough for everyone
items.body: Sip sunset spritzes together on sofas and long benches while Positano's pastel skyline unfolds in front of you.

items.title: Roomy sleeping quarters
items.body: Six solid bunks with privacy curtains, personal lights and sockets keep things quiet when you need rest.

items.title: Ready for beach days
items.body: Store bags in key-card lockers, hang swimsuits on the terrace racks and rinse off quickly in the ensuite.
